summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6242 for the improvement of Sand Point Way, southeasterly side only, from Ivanhoe Place Northeast to East 64th Street; and easterly side only, from 60th Ave. Northeast to approximately 290 feet north of East 72nd Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89928, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
